author: REEMA
text:
Finally, it's at your doorstep... 

There is a story I'd heard in my childhood; "Zamindar or Magarmuch". 

Zamindar used to feed villagers to his pet Crocodile and one day there was no one left in his village than the Croc came and ate the Zamindar... https://t.co/mXVou2sJPr

author: REEMA
text:
